rows.story_text:
The drum has always been an important musical instrument in our community. We love drums!

We have drums of different sizes: big, medium-sized, and small.

story_text.eng:
The drum has always been an important musical instrument in our community. We love drums!

We have drums of different sizes: big, medium-sized, and small.

annotation_1.eng: Think of things that have the same shape with different sizes. Perhaps one big and one small, or three with big, medium, and small.

annotation_2.eng: Think of stories about three things. Some examples are: The Three Little Pigs and Goldilocks.

annotation_3.eng: Have you ever beat on a drum? Which of these three would you choose?

rows.annotation_1: Think of things that have the same shape with different sizes. Perhaps one big and one small, or three with big, medium, and small.
rows.annotation_2: Think of stories about three things. Some examples are: The Three Little Pigs and Goldilocks.
rows.annotation_3: Have you ever beat on a drum? Which of these three would you choose?

rows.story_text:
We play drums using beaters, or with our fingers.

We play drums for various reasons: We play drums with songs and dances, for feasts, and in bad times.

story_text.eng:
We play drums using beaters, or with our fingers.

We play drums for various reasons: We play drums with songs and dances, for feasts, and in bad times.

annotation_1.eng: People use drums to make rhythms. Make up your own rhythm and count it. For example:  (clapping for each number) "1, 2, pause, 3, 1, 2, pause 3."

annotation_2.eng: How do you suppose a beater sounds different than using fingers?

annotation_3.eng: How does the small drum sound different than the large one?

rows.annotation_1: People use drums to make rhythms. Make up your own rhythm and count it. For example:  (clapping for each number) "1, 2, pause, 3, 1, 2, pause 3."
rows.annotation_2: How do you suppose a beater sounds different than using fingers?
rows.annotation_3: How does the small drum sound different than the large one?

rows.story_text:
Drums enrich songs and make people want to dance. Drums make ceremonies colorful.

We play drums during ceremonies for marriage and child naming. We play drums when celebrating a new harvest or a twin birth.

story_text.eng:
Drums enrich songs and make people want to dance. Drums make ceremonies colorful.

We play drums during ceremonies for marriage and child naming. We play drums when celebrating a new harvest or a twin birth.

annotation_1.eng: People are wearing special wedding clothes. Count together the people wearing orange.

annotation_2.eng: Which color are the drummers wearing?

annotation_3.eng: Count together all the people at the wedding. Can you count that high?

rows.annotation_1: People are wearing special wedding clothes. Count together the people wearing orange.
rows.annotation_2: Which color are the drummers wearing?
rows.annotation_3: Count together all the people at the wedding. Can you count that high?

rows.story_text: We sound drums to announce grief and call people when death occurs.

story_text.eng: We sound drums to announce grief and call people when death occurs.

annotation_1.eng: What does sad drumming sound like? Can you make a soft, sad rhythm with your hands?

annotation_2.eng: There are many kinds of drumming, such as soft background rhythms or fast loud rhythms. Which kinds of drumming have you heard?

annotation_3.eng: Does a drumbeat make you want to dance?

rows.annotation_1: What does sad drumming sound like? Can you make a soft, sad rhythm with your hands?
rows.annotation_2: There are many kinds of drumming, such as soft background rhythms or fast loud rhythms. Which kinds of drumming have you heard?
rows.annotation_3: Does a drumbeat make you want to dance?

rows.story_text:
We sound drums to call people to clean wells, clear roads, or to build a hut for a needy old person.

We sound drums to call people when cattle are stolen in our village.

story_text.eng:
We sound drums to call people to clean wells, clear roads, or to build a hut for a needy old person.

We sound drums to call people when cattle are stolen in our village.

annotation_1.eng: Where you live, what sound or method do people use to call people together for food, school, or special events?

annotation_2.eng: Would you rather beat the drum or do the work?

annotation_3.eng: Count together the number of tools people are using in this picture.

rows.annotation_1: Where you live, what sound or method do people use to call people together for food, school, or special events?
rows.annotation_2: Would you rather beat the drum or do the work?
rows.annotation_3: Count together the number of tools people are using in this picture.

rows.story_text: We sound drums to gather for meetings at our chief's palace.

story_text.eng: We sound drums to gather for meetings at our chief's palace.

annotation_1.eng: What is something in this picture that shows this is a special place?

annotation_2.eng: How many people are gathering in this picture?

annotation_3.eng: Where do you think the chief will sit?

rows.annotation_1: What is something in this picture that shows this is a special place?
rows.annotation_2: How many people are gathering in this picture?
rows.annotation_3: Where do you think the chief will sit?

rows.story_text:
Drums call people to go to church for prayers on Sundays and other prayer days.

We also play drums to enrich songs when singing in churches.

story_text.eng:
Drums call people to go to church for prayers on Sundays and other prayer days.

We also play drums to enrich songs when singing in churches.

annotation_1.eng: Items made from wood come from trees. Which items in this picture are made of wood?

annotation_2.eng: Which things are made of wood where you are?

annotation_3.eng: There are straps on the drums in each picture. Why are the straps useful?

rows.annotation_1: Items made from wood come from trees. Which items in this picture are made of wood?
rows.annotation_2: Which things are made of wood where you are?
rows.annotation_3: There are straps on the drums in each picture. Why are the straps useful?

rows.story_text:
The big drum sounds, "An a bul mba, an a bul mba, an a bul mba-mba-mba-mba bul."

The small drums sing in their high pitches, "Tindiri, tindiri tindiri ti."

Together they chorus, "Tindiri mba, tindiri mba, tindiri mba-mba-mba-mba, tindiri ti!"

story_text.eng:
The big drum sounds, "An a bul mba, an a bul mba, an a bul mba-mba-mba-mba bul."

The small drums sing in their high pitches, "Tindiri, tindiri tindiri ti."

Together they chorus, "Tindiri mba, tindiri mba, tindiri mba-mba-mba-mba, tindiri ti!"

annotation_1.eng: A duet is when two intruments are played together. Have you sung duets with your family or friends?

annotation_2.eng: Make up a clapping duet. One person starts with a clapping pattern, and then the other person creates a clapping pattern that goes well with it.

annotation_3.eng: When you hear music, listen for the instruments that create the beat.

rows.annotation_1: A duet is when two intruments are played together. Have you sung duets with your family or friends?
rows.annotation_2: Make up a clapping duet. One person starts with a clapping pattern, and then the other person creates a clapping pattern that goes well with it.
rows.annotation_3: When you hear music, listen for the instruments that create the beat.
